brief: Unable to access or mount ntfs partitions, Its because ntfs-3g is pre-installed, thunar did't find /sbin/mount.ntfs
status: Fixed - Install ntfs-3g from Bazaar - AppMarket, and execute $ sudo ln -srv /bin/ntfs-3g /sbin/mount.ntfs

summary: date time not autosync from internet
brief: tzdata that provide localtime info and ntp is missing that sync time from internet
status: Fixed - Install tzdata, ntp from Bazaar, and execute $ sudo /etc/init.d/ntpd-client start
